results.content: Short and too the point.  The audio was a bit distorted at times and the content was outdated sometimes.  Overall, not bad for a basic application in Ember
results.content_html: Short and too the point. The audio was a bit distorted at times and the content was outdated sometimes. Overall, not bad for a basic application in Ember

results.content:
The sound is not 100%, but I could understand it properly.
The main problem with the course is that is was rushed, all HTML content was just pasted and explained. The instructor should build a simpler HTML and get on with the course.
Also, there was too much not-Ember explanation at the beginnig. The course should go deeper into Ember and waste less time on not so important things, and should go deeper on more important things.
results.content_html:
The sound is not 100%, but I could understand it properly.
The main problem with the course is that is was rushed, all HTML content was just pasted and explained. The instructor should build a simpler HTML and get on with the course.
Also, there was too much not-Ember explanation at the beginnig. The course should go deeper into Ember and waste less time on not so important things, and should go deeper on more important things.
